question: Summary of Benefits and Coverage (SBC)
text:
Summary of Benefits and Coverage (SBC)
          
        
An easy-to-read summary of the health plans you can enroll in through Pennie that lets you compare costs and coverage between plans. You can compare plans based on price, benefits, and other features that may be important to you. You'll see the "Summary of Benefits and Coverage" (SBC) when you shop for coverage after completing your Pennie application or when renewing or changing coverage. You can also request an SBC from the health insurance company.
